price: 29. En jullie willen niet, tenzij het is dat Allah wil – de Heer van de werelden.
arabic: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wamā tashāūna illā an yashāa al-lahu rabbu al-ʿālamīna
